release.change: Update: The zone data for Overath is now officially provided by the city.
Bugfix: Invitations to rate the app or to become a beta tester are not shown again if tapped before.
Android: Now the lowest, supported version is Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) to allow future development of the app.
New: Overath has a zone since October 01, 2017. The response to the data request is pending.
New: Balingen has a zone since April 01, 2017. Together with the city we managed to digitize the coordinates of the zone.
New: Users are invited to become beta testers.
New: Users are invited to rate the app.
Bugfix: Resolved rare crash at app startup (BadTokenException).
Update: Many internally used software components have been updated. Please reach out if you notice problems with the app.
Update: The zone data for Leipzig is now officially provided by the city.
Improved: Fix showing city info twice after rotating the device.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Eschweiler (since 06/01/16).
Update: Augsburg only allows cars with a green badge as of June 1, 2016.
Update: Mention Duisburg in the list of cities of the Ruhrgebiet zone.
Improved: The URLs for "Further information online" in the "City info" screen are up-to-date now.
Improved: Prevent rare crash which happened during an update of a zone without coordinates.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Marburg (since 04/01/16).
Update: Minor adjustments to the zone coordinates of Halle (Saale). Data has finally been provided by the city.
Display libraries in alphabetical order in "About" screen.
Improved: Parts of the underlying code have been rewritten to allow running automated tests.
New: Add zone data without coordinates for Marburg (since 04/01/16). The city still works on publishing the data.
Update: The zone of Halle slightly changed at 03/03/16. However, the city did not yet send the latest zone data!
Bugfix: Resolve crash on Android 2.3 when selecting a city.
Bugfix: Prevent crash when Google Play Services are not present.
Improved: Display slightly different text with respect to the current date for zones which become effective in the future.
Improved: Refactor "Share this app" feature to ensure compatibility with older Android versions.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Aachen.
New: Add menu item "Share this app".
New: Add zone data without coordinates for Aachen (since 02/01/16). A request to the city has been made but waits for being answered.
New: Allow to show the map on the lock screen of your device.
Update: Add one more e-mail address to contact Wiesbaden.
Update: More detailed error information when crash happens.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Darmstadt (since 11/01/15).
Bugfix: Resolved failure to restore the map state (zoom position) after the device has been rotated.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Wuppertal, Heidelberg and Magdeburg.
Update: Add one more contact e-mail for Wiesbaden.
Improved: High resolution app icon can now be shown on every device.
Improved: Add more tests to avoid introducing bugs.
New: Brand new colors! The statusbar, toolbar, links, buttons, highlights and dialogs are inked now.
New: A new fresh application icon.
Bugfix: Loading the default city on 1st application launch works as expected now.
Improved: Removed Bochum since it is part of the Ruhrgebiet.
Improved: Scroll effect in FAQs works correctly now.
Improved: Avoid crashes when clicking links on some devices.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Pfinztal and Karlsruhe.
Update: Penalities increased - read the FAQs!
New: Add zone data for 13 cities with coordinates (Dinslaken, Erfurt, Ilsfeld, Krefeld, Langenfeld, Leonberg, Ludwigsburg, Mühlacker, Offenbach, Schwäbisch Gmünd, Tübingen, Urbach and Wendlingen).
Update: Zone coordinates for Reutlingen changed by February 1, 2015.
New: Display name of the selected low emission zone.
Improved: Crash report dialog is customized and texts translated.
New: Add zone data for 13 cities with geo-coordinates (Bonn, Halle, Heidenheim, Heilbronn, Herrenberg, Mainz, Mannheim, Osnabrück, Pforzheim, Remscheid, Reutlingen, Schramberg and Siegen).
New: Support zones where geo-coordinates are not available.
New: Add function which allows to contact the government via email yourself.

New: Add zone data for 20 cities without geo-coordinates (Bochum, Dinslaken, Erfurt, Heidelberg, Ilsfeld, Karlsruhe, Krefeld, Langenfeld, Leonberg, Ludwigsburg, Magdeburg, Mühlacker, Offenbach, Pfinztal, Schwäbisch Gmünd, Tübingen, Urbach, Wendlingen, Wiesbaden and Wuppertal).
Update: Zone number for Münster.
New: Add geometry sources for each zone.
New: Add individual dates for last geometry updates.
Update: Revise license information.
Improved: Refactor caching mechanism for zone data.
Bugfix: Fix dysfunctional logging modules.
New: Update zone for Düsseldorf, Hagen, Köln, Mönchengladbach, Neuss and Ruhrgebiet.
New: English translation of the app
New: Redesign of text links in various screens
New: Redesign for 10" tablets
New: Update for the following zones: Berlin, Neuss
New: More zones: Freiburg im Breisgau, Mönchengladbach, Neu-Ulm
Bugfix: Unlock HTC devices, resolved crash with web links
New: More zones: Augsburg, Hagen, Neuss, Ulm and the Ruhrgebiet
Bugfix: Resolved rendering error of the version information
New: Decreased loading time for city list and info through caching
New: Added link to online sticker application form (Berlin)
New: Mention OpenStreetMap as a data source
New: City-specific logging for buttons
Bugfix: Removed endless loop when changing between FAQs and zone info
Bugfix: Resolved rendering error of the logo
Bugfix: Resolved rendering error of zone stickers
New: Five more cities: Düsseldorf, Bremen, Leipzig, Hannover and Münster
New: Version information tell about new features and bug fixes
New: Feedback becomes a separate menu item
New: Advanced error logging when Google Play Services is not installed
New: Advanced logging when no city has been selected
